name: SROWSER
body:
# Welcome to Edrowser.
This sleek, innovative and once and for-all fully editable and code-worthy web-browser/programming platform for HTML5 is really worth it. And it's **FREE**

##Updates##
**VERSION: 2.5**
- Added Achievements
- Added `Accounts` Page
- Improved UI
- Removed Bugs


### Designer Features
Publish, Edit, Code, Remix or just read websites has never been easier. With the Release of *Version2.5* there is new features everywhere.

### Achievements 
To un-bore programmers, we added a load of achievements for coding experience such as _Heads_ which can be unblocked when a user creates a more than 10 headers! 
"This is hell fun!" - sn0wber1a From _CodeX_

### Authors and Contributors
Edr0wser is owned and developed by SkimmerCo. The [CEO](sepworld.me) is enthused in creating better living and coding environments for everyone.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Edrowser? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
